FCCANALYSIS-COMBINE-SCRIPT(7) fccanalysis-combine-script man page FCCANALYSIS-COMBINE-SCRIPT(7)

NAME

fccanalysis-combine-script – analysis script for the combine stage of the analysis

SYNOPSIS

*

DESCRIPTION

The analysis script for the combine stage of the analysis is expected to be a valid Python script containing, among other variables, definitions of signal, background, categories and systematic uncertainties. To run the combine stage do

fccanalysis combine analysis_combine_script.py

ATTRIBUTES

User can use the following global attributes to control the behavior of the combine stage.

inputDir (mandatory)
User has to specify the directory where the input files coming from the previous analysis stage are stored.
outputDir (mandatory)
User has to specify the directory for the combine datacards.
intLumi (mandatory)
Expected integrated luminosity in pb^{-1}.
sig_procs (mandatory)
List of processes considered signal.
bkg_procs (mandatory)
List of processes considered background.
categories (mandatory)
List of categories to be evaluated.
hist_names (mandatory)
List of histogram names connected with the category.
systs (mandatory)
List of systematic uncertainties to be considered.
selection (optional)
User can specify the selection to be used.
Default value: No selection
mc_stats (optional)
Whether Combine should handle MC statistical uncertainties automatically.
Default value: False
rebin (optional)
Rebin factor to be applied on the input histograms.
Default value: 1

This section is under construction. You are invited to help :)
